caption:
"A glossy ceramic mug with deep blue coloring and rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding hot drinks. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."

"A possibly glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."

"Inconclusive evidence for the category of the object in the green bounding box. It appears to be a metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A black induction cooktop with smooth surface and circular heating elements. Flat rectangular shape with control panel. Designed for cooking food. Positioned above a wooden cabinet in a tiled kitchen area."

"A white appliance with a digital display and buttons. Rectangular shape with a door featuring a window. Likely a microwave oven. Placed on a countertop next to other kitchen items like a kettle and utensils."
